main.bio: • CS student with experience in full-stack web development and an interest in developing impactful software • Proficient with JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Python, Java, C++ and open to learning new languages/tools • Previous software engineering internships at Amazon (AWS), Zanbato, NextRoll, Autodesk and Uptake • Currently looking for a 2024 internship, so if any opportunity arises, feel free to reach out!
